short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View NPM package downloads for Github repositories.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Wondering if a package's popularity is on the rise or decline? NPM on GitHub detects if the current repository has a matching package on NPM and displays its information right on GitHub so you can decide if it's the right fit for your project.
